data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rosa, Paolo, Wei, Na-sen, Feng, Jun, Xu, Zai-fu (2016): Revision of the genus Trichrysis Lichtenstein, 1876 from China, with description of three new species (Hymenoptera, Chrysididae). Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 63 (1): 109-136, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.63.7347, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.63.7347
